turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about RahXephon.
turn.1: What kind of music is RahXephon?
turn.2: Hashimoto's compositions range from piano sonatas and acoustic chamber music to experimental jazz, hard rock, and ambience that crosses the border into sound design.
turn.3: Is she still a composer today?
turn.4: She also includes more mainstream jazz and orchestral music played with both acoustic and electronic instruments.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: A television movie version of "RahXephon" called "Pluralitas Concentio" was directed by Tomoki Kyoda, who had directed three episodes of the TV series and acted as assistant director with Soichi Masui.
turn.8: Izubuchi acted as Chief Director on this movie, but was not heavily involved in its production.
turn.10: Most of the staff members involved with the TV series worked on the movie, and it was distributed by Shochiku.
turn.12: The producers were Masahiko Minami, Shiro Sasaki, Maki Horiuchi, Kenji Shimizu, and Tatsuji Yamazaki.
